body: She's the one who's being aggressive. The zombie thing is treated as a disease, where the victim gradually turns into a zombie, losing their mind. He told her he will help her to not forget she is alive. She take that as having sex, and her endurance is like a zombie (like, she keep on going, and he even doubted if what she said before about losing her senses is even true).
I don't understand a thing but looks wholesome
